name: PikachuTalk
0:
”Alexa, ask Pikachu to talk”
”Use Thunderbolt”
”Tell me a funny story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pikachu
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Haven’t you always wanted to have a conversation with Pikachu? Well, now you can! You can talk to
Pikachu about anything—you’re sure to hear all sorts of wonderful and charming responses. Ask Pikachu
to “use Thunderbolt,” and then hear if it’s in the mood to use its electrifying move! Say “tell me a funny
story,” and then Pikachu will spin a yarn as only it can. If it’s your special day, Pikachu can “sing ‘Happy
Birthday to You.’ ” Even something silly, like “say ‘pizza’ ten times,” will get Pikachu chatting! There’s
plenty more for you and Pikachu to talk about—just say “Alexa, ask Pikachu to talk,” and then chat away!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
